Title: Root out the Hu Feng counter-revolutionary clique exhibition cartoons 9
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: Most of the cartoons of a set of 20 posters, published during the anti-Hu Feng movement, cannot be linked to any of the 17 designers mentioned on the opening sheet.Poster nr. 9 shows Hu Feng sending out Guomindang secret agents (特务) disguised as workers (representatives of the CCP order) to sabotage the People's Republic.
